ing: 3 ounces grilled chicken, cut into bite-sized pieces
des: "This is a salad recipe my 6-year-old daughter Barbara came up with.  It's actually delicious! The pineapple juice is tastier than any salad dressing you could add to this."
ins: Combine the chicken, ham, lettuce, pineapple, and grapes in a large bowl; toss to combine.
